Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
From host institution
12
NII MOU Grants (NII, Japan)
o For PhD students.
o December/May every year.
o Topics and supervisors list.
o Duration depends on the supervisor there (eg, 2/3 months)
University South California (USC, EEUU)
o Summer Internship program.
o Topics available in the website.
o Deadline: February.
Look in the website of your target host!
